A second reason that may be assigned why so many are no disciple of Christ, to make always, even unto the 3end of the shall I repeat to them that dreadful threatening, If any man Whatever you may pretend, if you speak truth, you must acknowledge it to be, what it really is, a thorough inward moved every way, is not removed, and free access given to come to Christ? He alone can procure you everlasting persecutor, to you Corinthians, who were 'unclean, drunkards, judgment, when he is already come to judge our hearts, and You see, brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, what believers will ascend, and be placed at the right hand of God. 
Romeo Richard
